body_html: Perhaps the idx array can be pre-allocated instead of being extended at every iteration of the double-for loop. Or perhaps there's another way to calculate the indices that doesn't require a double for loop?
body_text: Perhaps the idx array can be pre-allocated instead of being extended at every iteration of the double-for loop.  Or perhaps there's another way to calculate the indices that doesn't require a double for loop?
body: Perhaps the idx array can be pre-allocated instead of being extended at every iteration of the double-for loop.  Or perhaps there's another way to calculate the indices that doesn't require a double for loop?
